title: Photolithograph, Christmas Souvenir Booklet: "English Authors", ca. 1880
description: Consists of seven pages including title page with photographs of important English authors (Series III): Collins, Trollope, McDonald, Black, Dickens, and Thackeray.  Printed cover is inscribed with title and decorated with vine leaves.  Bound with red silk ribbon bearing the words in gold lettering "Christmas Greetings".

tombstone.epitaph:
Photolithograph, Christmas Souvenir Booklet: "English Authors", ca. 1880. Photolithographs bound with silk ribbon. 
1960-220-1-1
